mapper.sql: select a.id, a.code, a.label, a.description, a.icon, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.parm, a.val, parm.id parm_id, parm.code parm_code, parm.label parm_label, parm.description parm_description, parm.icon parm_icon, parm.priority parm_priority, parm.flags parm_flags, parm."state" parm_state, parm.creation parm_creation, parm.lastmod parm_lastmod, parm."version" parm_version, parm."schema" parm_schema from _parmval a left join _parm parm on a.parm = parm.id

select a.id, a.code, a.label, a.description, a.icon, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.parm, a.val, parm.id parm_id, parm.code parm_code, parm.label parm_label, parm.description parm_description, parm.icon parm_icon, parm.priority parm_priority, parm.flags parm_flags, parm."state" parm_state, parm.creation parm_creation, parm.lastmod parm_lastmod, parm."version" parm_version, parm."schema" parm_schema from _parmval a left join _parm parm on a.parm = parm.id
